The Quranic researcher is a family, that is, the strictness of the worship, and a loudest man who is informed of a family, while it was mentioned, but he was overwhelmed by the courage if his sins are thrived, so he will be fed up.And with this face, the faces of the disbelief, you think that it will be done with it.I decided the camel if I called his nose with the fire and an actor that you think is the guarantor of the faces with the appreciation of the added estimated, that is, you think that it will be the same as the one who is the one who is a good one to me.The self is useful and distant.And the suspicion is said that I want the leanness and its good choice, and that the source does not fall after the verb of verification without the verb of the thought or what is the same as the one who does After him, like the tightening and the fearful of what was stipulated in the satisfaction and it was said that he is the most famous, and what is intended By the intermediate interview, the view will be then in the meaning that is removed as it claims that those who claimed it and realize that that what is doing them is in the absence of the Lord of the Lord That is the end of the grace, and this is the end of the nursery, and it comes with the verb of the suspicion.With the sake of the torment that is not offended, all of what is doing it is one of the most severely, and it is more severe than it and signed more than it.The matter is that the knowledge of the one is located, not with what is renewed at the time.And then they tasted it, then after that, in that view, it is weak and weakened by the lineage to the one who decided what he decided.His vision is his grace.
